name: Severance: Blade of Darkness
notes:
During install process uncheck 'Install DirectX' and 'View Readme file'
Intro doesn't work press 'Space Bar' or 'ESC' to skip it
Video mode has an included option for 'rOpenGL' video those of you that may have issues
Set audio to 'Miles Fast 2D Positional Audio'
content:
files:
- raster: http://rampage.bigtruck-canada.ca/blade/oth/raster.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Codemasters/Severance/Bin/Blade.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: SetUp.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Severance Blade of Darkness...
    executable: $DISC/SetUp.exe
    name: wineexec
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Codemasters/Severance/
    src: raster
wine:
  Desktop: true
